thread.title: Don't slip up on soapie audition scam, warns e.tv
thread.title_full: Don't slip up on soapie audition scam, warns e.tv | News24

author: news24.com
title: Don't slip up on soapie audition scam, warns e.tv
text:
Johannesburg - Broadcaster e.tv on Thursday warned the public about a scam asking people to pay R500 to audition for a spot on Rhythm City.
An e-mail circulating on social media, purported to come from the soap opera's actress Amo Chidi, asks people to register and pay to attend the audition at e.tv's offices on Saturday, the broadcaster said in a statement.
Auditions for the soap opera were co-ordinated through Rhythm Cityâ€™s production company, Quizzical Pictures, and were free of charge. They were not organised by any third party or cast members.
People were urged not to be taken in by the scam. Inquiries about auditions could be sent to rcinfo@soapcitysa.co.za.
